sentences.english: Guiyang is on a tributary of the Wu River in the center of the Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 貴陽位於烏江支流上，居貴州省的正中央。

sentences.english: The expensive sun is all the hot springs of China, the world go to summer resort it all.
sentences.chinese: 貴陽是中國的溫泉之都，世界的避暑之都。

sentences.english: Because of a dense fog in Anshun, our plane landed in Guiyang instead.
sentences.chinese: 由於安順大霧，飛機臨時改降貴陽。

sentences.english: In Guiyang, colored brook some winds and the woman deeply deeply areenticing me.
sentences.chinese: 在貴陽，花溪的一些風和女人將我深深地勾引着。

sentences.english: Zhuang Guiyang discusses the difficulty of analysing climate-change policy-making in China.
sentences.chinese: 莊貴陽在文章內討論了中國在氣候決策方面的難處。

sentences.english: The second case is a 29-year-old male from Guiyang city, Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 第二例是一名來自貴州貴陽市的29歲男子。

sentences.english: The provincial road from Guiyang to Kaiyang was, indeed, marvellous.
sentences.chinese: 那條從貴陽到開陽的省級公路的確是棒極了。

sentences.english: There are mountains on all sides [four sides].
Huaxi, in the southern outskirts of Guiyang, is the typical suburban agriculture area in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 花溪區地處貴陽市南郊，是貴州典型的城郊農業區。

sentences.english: The peach leafhopper( Typhlocyba sudra )is one of the important insect pests of peach tree in Guiyang.
sentences.chinese: 桃一點小葉蟬在貴陽是桃和碧桃的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Then he sent a unit to surround Longli southeast of Guiyang .
sentences.chinese: 於是他派遺了一支部隊去圍住貴陽東南的龍里。

sentences.english: Finally, applicability of main HVAC technologies in Guiyang City is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，討論了貴陽市主要暖通空調技術的適用性。

sentences.english: Like to play flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 來自貴陽，愛好長笛和葫蘆絲演奏。

sentences.english: The pathogen Capnodium sp. causes a serious sooty mold disease on Lagerstroemia indica in Guiyang.
sentences.chinese: 紫薇煤污病是貴陽地區紫薇的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: My name is Grace. I am in Grade 11.
sentences.chinese: 我叫王鈺，現就讀於貴陽一中中加班11年級。

sentences.english: Guiyang is the China capital of hot spring, the summer capital of the world.
sentences.chinese: 貴陽是中國的溫泉之都，世界的避暑之都。
